102498.markdown: Fix a bug that a preemptor pod may exist as a phantom in the scheduler. ([#102498](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102498), [@Huang-Wei](https://github.com/Huang-Wei)) [SIG Scheduling]
102498.author: Huang-Wei

102502.text: kubeadm: when using a custom image repository for CoreDNS kubeadm now will append the "coredns"  image name instead of  "coredns/coredns", thus restoring the behaviour existing before the v1.21 release. Users who rely on nested folder for the coredns image should set the "clusterConfiguration.dns.imageRepository" value including the nested path name (e.g using "registry.company.xyz/coredns" will force kubeadm to use "registry.company.xyz/coredns/coredns" image). No action is needed if using the default registry (k8s.gcr.io).
102502.markdown: Kubeadm: when using a custom image repository for CoreDNS kubeadm now will append the "coredns"  image name instead of  "coredns/coredns", thus restoring the behaviour existing before the v1.21 release. Users who rely on nested folder for the coredns image should set the "clusterConfiguration.dns.imageRepository" value including the nested path name (e.g using "registry.company.xyz/coredns" will force kubeadm to use "registry.company.xyz/coredns/coredns" image). No action is needed if using the default registry (k8s.gcr.io). ([#102502](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102502), [@ykakarap](https://github.com/ykakarap)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
102502.author: ykakarap

102587.text: Reverted the previous fix for portforward cleanup because it introduced a kubelet regression which can lead into segmentation faults.
102587.markdown: Reverted the previous fix for portforward cleanup because it introduced a kubelet regression which can lead into segmentation faults. ([#102587](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102587), [@saschagrunert](https://github.com/saschagrunert)) [SIG API Machinery and Node]
102587.author: saschagrunert

102673.text: kubeadm: remove the "ephemeral_storage" request from the etcd static pod that kubeadm deploys on stacked etcd control plane nodes. This request has caused sporadic failures on some setups due to a problem in the kubelet with cadvisor and the LocalStorageCapacityIsolation feature gate. See this issue for more details: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/99305
102673.markdown: Kubeadm: remove the "ephemeral_storage" request from the etcd static pod that kubeadm deploys on stacked etcd control plane nodes. This request has caused sporadic failures on some setups due to a problem in the kubelet with cadvisor and the LocalStorageCapacityIsolation feature gate. See this issue for more details: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/99305 ([#102673](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/102673), [@jackfrancis](https://github.com/jackfrancis)) [SIG Cluster Lifecycle]
102673.author: jackfrancis
